org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.sweep.bundled
Class BundledSweep

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.sweep.bundled.BundledSweep

public class BundledSweep
extends java.lang.Object

This class comprises classes and interfaces that specify the abstracted leader/follower coordination pattern with bundling. This coordination makes two faces available to the outside world: BundledSweep.Leader and BundledSweep.Follower.

When communicating via the Leader face, the external Agent submits requests and will then receive responses from each of the followers.

When communicating via the Response face, the external Agent must provide a response to each query it receives.

Internal description:

The Leader face collects pending requests into a bundle and sends them to the follower agent, via a relay. The follower agent will then unbundle the requests and produce them through its Follower face, then collect the responses, bundle them and return them to the leader agent. No guarantee is made that the same number of requests will be returned by the follower, but the requester will return at least one result and old results may be returned in subsequent bundles.
